channel.title: 2006Revived - #1 Old School RSPS (500+ Registered Members)
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/PJaBU41.gif[/img][/center] Website: http://www.2006Revived.com/landing Download Client: http://www.2006Revived.com/client [center][size=18pt][i][b]2006REVIVED, THE NEXT BIGGEST 2006 REMAKE![/b][/i][/size] 'There are so many remakes out there, why bother?' We intend of becoming not only a 2006 remake, but the BIGGEST! We have 1,000$ budget in which will be used for advertising, a fantastic community, over 10 constant updating developers, around 20-30 updates every day!
[size=14pt][i][b]WHO WE ARE[/b][/i][/size] What is 2006Revived? 2006Revived is a in-development full-remake of Runescape in May 2006, we understand that the Runescape community and in need of that nostalgic hit to make them motivated to play Runescape again, we feel that this is our duty to bring to you the most in-developed, the most dedicated project you have ever witnessed, do not take our word for it though, come and check us out!
[size=12pt][i]This is what we currently have developed.[/i][/size]
[img]http://static4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130921115623/2007scape/images/f/fe/Attack_icon.png[/img]Attack All weapons can be wielded. All weapons have there correct attack animations. All weapons have there respected interfaces and sounds.
[img]http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130227091620/2007scape/images/3/3e/Strength-icon.png[/img]Strength All weapons can be used. All weapons have correct animations.
[img]http://static1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130227091718/2007scape/images/d/d8/Defence-icon.png[/img]Defence All armour can be equipped. All bonuses and de-buffs are correct.
[img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228041539/2007scape/images/7/77/Magic-icon.png[/img]Magic All teleports work. Teleporting gains Magic XP. Correct Magic animations
[img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228041522/2007scape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img]Prayer All bones can be buried. All prayers working. Prayer drain rate perfected.
[img]http://static1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228040729/2007scape/images/7/72/Ranged-icon.png[/img]Ranged All bows can be used. All bows have there correct animations. Working bonuses depending on the bow. All arrows work to their corresponding bow.
[img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130227091815/2007scape/images/d/df/Smithing-icon.png[/img]Smithing Every bar smithable. Every bar smeltable. Correct animations.
[img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228041558/2007scape/images/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png[/img]Runecrafting All tiara's added. Finding alters via talismans perfected. All working altars.
[img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228041615/2007scape/images/4/48/Crafting-icon.png[/img]Crafting Correct Crafting animations. All d'hide's craftable. Spinning perfected.
[img]http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130227091749/2007scape/images/2/28/Mining-icon.png[/img]Mining All ores mineable. Emptying and refilling rocks. Prospecting perfected. Correct pickaxe finding and animations.
[img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228041652/2007scape/images/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png[/img]Fishing All fishes fishable All working equipment. Correct fishing animations.
[img]http://static1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228040755/2007scape/images/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png[/img]Cooking All fishes cookable All meats cookable Correct animations and burnings. Can eat all food.
[img]http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228041715/2007scape/images/6/6d/Firemaking-icon.png[/img]Firemaking Correct animations, and failures. All logs lightable. Ashes. Can click logs on ground and light. All logs lightable.
Questing Working Quest point system. All Free Quests coded. 15% Member Quests coded. (Including Monkey Madness)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uzR97.png[/img]Minigames Duel Arena Pest Control Barbarian Assault Barrows Fightpits
[img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130227091638/2007scape/images/8/84/Agility-icon.png[/img]Agility Correct Agility animations. Three courses coded. Correct XP and failures.
[img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228042634/2007scape/images/f/f1/Herblore-icon.png[/img]Herblore All herbs working and usable. All herbs identifiable. All herbs can be mixed and created into potions. Correct animations.
[img]http://static1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228042655/2007scape/images/f/f3/Thieving-icon.png[/img]Thieving All stalls thievable. Correct failures and stun rates. Correct dialogue for failures.
Fletching All bows fletchable. All arrows fletchable. All bolts fletchable. All darts flethable.
[img]http://static1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228042733/2007scape/images/c/cf/Slayer-icon.png[/img]Slayer All monsters slayable. Perfected rewards and XP. Correct slayer tasks and reasonable amounts. Correct awards. Need certain items to attack some creatures.
[img]http://static4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228042814/2007scape/images/f/f0/Farming-icon.png[/img]Farming All seeds plantable. Harvesting perfected. Correct XP rates. Compost bins.
[img]http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130228041636/2007scape/images/0/0f/Woodcutting-icon.png[/img]Woodcutting Stumps and regrowing trees Correct hatchet animations All trees cut-able. All birds nests working.
PHOTOS: [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/11lmyad.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2my6u7q.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/mhd7id.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/155npdu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/fo2kol.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2w5vldz.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/30cvns2.gif[/img][/center]

item.title: 2006Revived - #1 Old School RSPS (500+ Registered Members)
item.dc:creator: @jonniemiec jonniemiec
item.description:
@jonniemiec wrote:

[center][/center]
Website: http://www.2006Revived.com/landing
Download Client: http://www.2006Revived.com/client
[center][size=18pt]2006REVIVED, THE NEXT BIGGEST 2006 REMAKE![/size]
‘There are so many remakes out there, why bother?’ We intend of becoming not only a 2006 remake, but the BIGGEST!
We have 1,000$ budget in which will be used for advertising, a fantastic community, over 10 constant updating developers, around 20-30 updates every day!

[size=14pt]WHO WE ARE[/size]
What is 2006Revived? 2006Revived is a in-development full-remake of Runescape in May 2006, we understand that the Runescape community and in need of that nostalgic hit to make them motivated to play Runescape again, we feel that this is our duty to bring to you the most in-developed, the most dedicated project you have ever witnessed, do not take our word for it though, come and check us out!

[size=12pt]This is what we currently have developed.[/size]

Attack
All weapons can be wielded.
All weapons have there correct attack animations.
All weapons have there respected interfaces and sounds.

Strength
All weapons can be used.
All weapons have correct animations.

Defence
All armour can be equipped.
All bonuses and de-buffs are correct.

Magic
All teleports work.
Teleporting gains Magic XP.
Correct Magic animations

Prayer
All bones can be buried.
All prayers working.
Prayer drain rate perfected.

Ranged
All bows can be used.
All bows have there correct animations.
Working bonuses depending on the bow.
All arrows work to their corresponding bow.

Smithing
Every bar smithable.
Every bar smeltable.
Correct animations.

Runecrafting
All tiara’s added.
Finding alters via talismans perfected.
All working altars.

Crafting
Correct Crafting animations.
All d’hide’s craftable.
Spinning perfected.

Mining
All ores mineable.
Emptying and refilling rocks.
Prospecting perfected.
Correct pickaxe finding and animations.

Fishing
All fishes fishable
All working equipment.
Correct fishing animations.

Cooking
All fishes cookable
All meats cookable
Correct animations and burnings.
Can eat all food.

Firemaking
Correct animations, and failures.
All logs lightable.
Ashes.
Can click logs on ground and light.
All logs lightable.

Questing
Working Quest point system.
All Free Quests coded.
15% Member Quests coded. (Including Monkey Madness)

Minigames
Duel Arena
Pest Control
Barbarian Assault
Barrows
Fightpits

Agility
Correct Agility animations.
Three courses coded.
Correct XP and failures.

Herblore
All herbs working and usable.
All herbs identifiable.
All herbs can be mixed and created into potions.
Correct animations.

Thieving
All stalls thievable.
Correct failures and stun rates.
Correct dialogue for failures.

Fletching
All bows fletchable.
All arrows fletchable.
All bolts fletchable.
All darts flethable.

Slayer
All monsters slayable.
Perfected rewards and XP.
Correct slayer tasks and reasonable amounts.
Correct awards.
Need certain items to attack some creatures.

Farming
All seeds plantable.
Harvesting perfected.
Correct XP rates.
Compost bins.

Woodcutting
Stumps and regrowing trees
Correct hatchet animations
All trees cut-able.
All birds nests working.
